law.catch_line: A person may not solicit coverage in the State under a policy of group health insurance or blanket h...
law.text: A person may not solicit coverage in the State under a policy of group health insurance or blanket health insurance issued in another jurisdiction without the prior written approval of the Commissioner, unless the type of group to be covered conforms substantially to one of the groups described in § 15-302 or § 15-305 of this subtitle.
